quote: Art is dangerous. It is one of the attractions: when it ceases to be dangerous you don't want it.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: Aesthetic emotion puts man in a state favorable to the reception of erotic emotion. Art is the accomplice of love. Take love away and there is no longer art.
name: Remy de Gourmont

quote: When the bright angel dominates, out comes a great work of art, a Michelangelo David or a Beethoven symphony.
name: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: I like the fact that in ancient Chinese art the great painters always included a deliberate flaw in their work: human creation is never perfect.
name: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: I'm not dead and I don't have blue hair but some people say there are similarities. It is usually intolerable to watch myself onscreen but this time it's fine. I think it's beautiful and a real work of art.
name: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: More than art, more than literature, music is universally accessible.
name: Billy Joel

quote: I think no artist can claim to have any access to the truth, or an authentic version of an event. But obviously they have slightly better means at their disposal because they have their art to energize whatever it is they're trying to write about. They have music.
name: Thom Yorke

quote: Every man should follow the bent of his nature in art and letters, always provided that he does not offend against the rules of morality and good taste.
name: Thomas Edward Brown

quote: He has only half learned the art of reading who has not added to it the more refined art of skipping and skimming.
name: Arthur Balfour

quote: If only life could be a little more tender and art a little more robust.
name: Alan Rickman

quote: Seek art from every time and place, in any form, to connect with those who really move you.
name: Martha Beck

quote: Back then, I didn't have a big organization around me. I was just a kid with a guitar, traveling around. My responsibility basically was to the art, and I had extra time on my hands. There is no extra time now. There isn't enough time.
name: Joni Mitchell

quote: There's no being wrong in seeing something in art, only being disagreed with.
name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: The art of living does not consist in preserving and clinging to a particular mode of happiness, but in allowing happiness to change its form without being disappointed by the change happiness, like a child, must be allowed to grow up.
name: Charles Morgan

quote: I think good art does come from a dark place.
name: Rick Springfield

quote: I think of art as the highest level of creativity. To me, it is one of the greatest sources of enjoyment.
name: David Rockefeller

quote: Literature has drawn a funny perimeter that other art forms haven't.
name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: Reading is an art form, and every man can be an artist.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: It is a myth that art has to be sold. It is not like stocking a grocery store where people fill a pushcart. Art is a product that has no apparent need. The salesperson builds the need in the mind of the buyer.
name: Jack White

quote: What I'm doing is art - it's low-brow art but there's a magic in that.
name: Kesha

quote: Art allows people a way to dream their way out of their struggle.
name: Russell Simmons

quote: I just like art. I get pure pleasure from it. I have a lot of wonderful paintings, and every time I look at them I see something different.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: I realize that every picture isn't a work of art.
name: Conrad Hall

quote: To be honest, I sort of feel like 'movie actor' isn't of this time. I love it. But it's a 20th-century art form.
name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: I view art as an inspirational tool.
name: Thomas Kincade

quote: What is art but a way of seeing?
name: Saul Bellow

quote: Any fool can have bad luck the art consists in knowing how to exploit it.
name: Frank Wedekind

quote: Good art provides people with a vocabulary about things they can't articulate.
name: Mos Def

quote: It has taken me years of struggle, hard work and research to learn to make one simple gesture, and I know enough about the art of writing to realize that it would take as many years of concentrated effort to write one simple, beautiful sentence.
name: Isadora Duncan

quote: Art may imitate life, but life imitates TV.
name: Ani DiFranco

quote: Celebrity doesn't have anything to do with art or craft. It's about being rich and thinking that you're better than everybody else.
name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: It is commonly supposed that the art of pleasing is a wonderful aid in the pursuit of fortune but the art of being bored is infinitely more successful.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: I've sort of escaped my background, as people often do, through art and culture.
name: Danny Boyle

quote: It is the glory and good of Art, That Art remains the one way possible Of speaking truth, to mouths like mine at least.
name: Robert Browning

quote: The art of the parenthesis is one of the greatest secrets of eloquence in Society.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: The worst state of affairs is when science begins to concern itself with art.
name: Paul Klee

quote: I was the hero of the young insurgent working class art movement.
name: Elia Kazan

quote: Thou art my single day, God lends to leaven What were all earth else, with a feel of heaven.
name: Robert Browning

quote: The art of being sick is not the same as the art of getting well.
name: Tony Snow

quote: Poetry is emotion put into measure. The emotion must come by nature, but the measure can be acquired by art.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: I'd like to introduce someone who has just come into my life. I've admired him for 35 years. He's someone who represents integrity, honesty, art, and on top of that stuff I'm actually sleeping with him.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: An art whose medium is language will always show a high degree of critical creativeness, for speech is itself a critique of life: it names, it characterizes, it passes judgment, in that it creates.
name: Thomas Mann

quote: Art is nothing but the expression of our dream the more we surrender to it the closer we get to the inner truth of things, our dream-life, the true life that scorns questions and does not see them.
name: Franz Marc

quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
name: James Humes

quote: I love to collect modern art.
name: Maria Sharapova

quote: For nine years I worked to change what was hairdressing then into a geometric art form with color, perm without setting which had never been done before.
name: Vidal Sassoon

quote: I choose films for their artistic value. I don't need a mansion or a Jaguar. When I leave this Earth, I won't take any money with me. All I will leave behind will be my art.
name: Brad Renfro

quote: Alchemy is the art of far and near, and I think poetry is alchemy in that way. It's delightful to distort size, to see something that's tiny as though it were vast.
name: Robert Morgan

quote: Only in men's imagination does every truth find an effective and undeniable existence. Imagination, not invention, is the supreme master of art as of life.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: The idea of avant-garde art is a very suspicious thing to me, the idea that poetry is new and it keeps being new the way Chevrolets every year are new.
name: Robert Morgan

quote: Any work that aspires, however humbly, to the condition of art should carry its justification in every line.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: When thou art at Rome, do as they do at Rome.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Rock isn't art, it's the way ordinary people talk.
name: Billy Idol

quote: Tell me thy company, and I'll tell thee what thou art.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Book-jacket design may become a lost art, like album-cover design, without which late-20th-century iconography would have been pauperized.
name: James Wolcott

quote: Art is nature speeded up and God slowed down.
name: Malcolm De Chazal

quote: There was a big drive when I was at art school to make you aware of the economy of meaning - after all, this was still during the tail end of minimalism. Being responsible for everything you put in your picture, and being able to defend it. Keeping everything clear around you so you know what is operating. To open the wound and keep it clean.
name: Jane Campion

quote: I was very much into buying contemporary art, but I've just decided I want to get rid of it all. Not that it's not great art, but all of a sudden my mood has changed, and I want to go back to seventeenth- and eighteenth-century masters.
name: Sylvester Stallone

quote: I did this Super-8 film at art school called 'Tissues,' this black comedy about a family whose father has been arrested for child molestation. I was absolutely thrilled by every inch of it, and would throw my projector in the back of my car and show it to anybody who would watch it.
name: Jane Campion

quote: The great art of films does not consist of descriptive movement of face and body but in the movements of thought and soul transmitted in a kind of intense isolation.
name: Louise Brooks

quote: Magic becomes art when it has nothing to hide.
name: Ben Okri

quote: Science is spectral analysis. Art is light synthesis.
name: Karl Kraus

quote: My first love is art, and I see a lot of things in an artistic way.
name: Robert Carlyle

quote: In my world, history comes down to language and art. No one cares much about what battles were fought, who won them and who lost them - unless there is a painting, a play, a song or a poem that speaks of the event.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: A compromise is the art of dividing a cake in such a way that everyone believes he has the biggest piece.
name: Ludwig Erhard

quote: Wushu is a move in Chinese, a physical move. An attack. Wushu is like an art.
name: Jet Li
